languages.text: "Они все виновны, пока не доказано обратное. Думаешь, малявка или старик не могут устроить покушение? Пусть помучаются, может, появится желание сознаться у кого-нибудь. А ты пошел вон, отродье предателя! Не то череп пробью за нападение на блюстителя, не посмотрю на чины".

"They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."
languages.original_text: "Они все виновны, пока не доказано обратное. Думаешь, малявка или старик не могут устроить покушение? Пусть помучаются, может, появится желание сознаться у кого-нибудь. А ты пошел вон, отродье предателя! Не то череп пробью за нападение на блюстителя, не посмотрю на чины".

Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. languages.text: « Ils sont tous présumés coupables en attendant la preuve du contraire. N'importe qui a pu attenter à la vie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, enfants et vieillards compris. En faisant preuve de persuasion, l'un d'entre eux passera peut-être aux aveux, allez savoir... Hors de ma vue, sale traître, ou je vous enfonce ma matraque dans le crâne pour avoir attaqué un prévôt. Je me fiche éperdument de votre titre. »
languages.original_text: "They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont tous présumés coupables en attendant la preuve du contraire. N'importe qui a pu attenter à la vie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, enfants et vieillards compris. En faisant preuve de persuasion, l'un d'entre eux passera peut-être aux aveux, allez savoir... Hors de ma vue, sale traître, ou je vous enfonce ma matraque dans le crâne pour avoir attaqué un prévôt dans l'exercice de ses fonctions. Maître-infernus ou pas, je me fiche éperdument de votre titre. »
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: «Son todos culpables hasta que se demuestre lo contrario. ¿Acaso crees que un niño o un anciano no pueden hacer peligrar la vida de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? En cuanto empiecen a notar el calor del fuego, tal vez alguno confiese. Así que lárgate, engendro traidor, o te reviento la cabeza con la porra por atacar a un guardia. Tu rango me importa un pimiento».
languages.original_text: "They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."

traits.locale_text: «Son todos culpables hasta que se demuestre lo contrario. ¿Acaso crees que un niño o un anciano no pueden hacer peligrar la vida de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? En cuanto empiecen a notar el calor del fuego, tal vez alguno confiese. Así que lárgate, engendro traidor, o te reviento la cabeza con la porra por atacar a un agente en acto de servicio. Tu rango me importa un pito».
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: “只要不能证明他们无罪，那他们就都有罪。难道小孩或老人就做不出威胁舰长大人性命的事情吗？我们打算给他们施加点压力，谁知道呢，说不定就有人招了呢。赶紧滚吧，叛徒的孽种，否则我就给你安个袭击执法者的罪名，再用警棍打烂你的脑袋。我一点都不在乎你是不是军官。”
languages.original_text: "They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."

traits.locale_text: “只要不能证明他们无罪，那他们就都有罪。难道小孩或老人就做不出威胁舰长大人性命的事情吗？我们打算给他们施加点压力，谁知道呢，说不定就有人招了呢。赶紧滚吧，叛徒的孽种，否则我就给你安个袭击执勤执法者的罪名，再用警棍打烂你的脑袋。我一点都不在乎你是不是军官。”
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: 「無罪を証明されるまでは有罪なんだよ。子供や老人がロード・キャプテンの命を脅かすようなことをしないと思うか？奴らに火をつければ、もしかしたら誰かが自白するかもしれない。だから、さっさと失せろ。さもないと、エンフォーサーを襲った罪で、お前の頭蓋骨に警棒をぶち込むぞ。お前の階級なんて知ったこっちゃないね」
languages.original_text: "They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."

traits.locale_text: 「無罪を証明されるまでは有罪なんだよ。子供や老人がロード・キャプテンの命を脅かすようなことをしないと思うか？奴らに火をつければ、もしかしたら誰かが自白するかもしれない。だから、さっさと失せろ。さもないと、職務中の執行官を襲った罪で、お前の頭蓋骨に警棒をぶち込むぞ。お前の階級なんて知ったこっちゃないね」
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: "Sie sind alle schuldig, bis das Gegenteil bewiesen ist. Glaubt Ihr etwa, ein Kind oder ein alter Mann kann nichts tun, was das Leben des Lord Captains gefährden könnte? Wenn wir ihnen ein wenig Feuer unter dem Hintern machen, wer weiß? Vielleicht gesteht dann einer. Also verschwindet, Ihr Verräterbrut, sonst ramme ich Euch einen Schlagstock durch den Schädel, weil Ihr einen Enforcer attackiert habt. Euer Rang schert mich einen Dreck."
languages.original_text: "They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."

traits.locale_text: "Sie sind alle schuldig, bis das Gegenteil bewiesen ist. Glaubt Ihr etwa, ein Kind oder ein alter Mann kann nichts tun, was das Leben des Lord Captains gefährden könnte? Wenn wir ihnen ein wenig Feuer unter dem Hintern machen, wer weiß? Vielleicht gesteht dann einer. Also verschwindet, Ihr Verräterbrut, sonst ramme ich Euch einen Schlagstock durch den Schädel, weil Ihr einen Enforcer im Dienst attackiert habt. Euer Rang schert mich einen Dreck."
traits.speaker: YetAnotherEnforcer

languages.text: "Aksi ispat edilene dek hepsi suçlu. Çocuğun ya da ihtiyar adamın tekinin Lord Kaptan'ın hayatını tehlikeye atacak bir şey yapmayacağını mı sanıyorsun? Hepsini köşeye sıkıştırdığımızda belki aralarından biri itirafta bulunur. Bas git şimdi hain dölü yoksa bir infazcıya saldırdığın için copumu kafandan geçiriveririm. Rütben hiç umurumda değil."
languages.original_text: "They're all guilty until proven otherwise. You think a kid or an old man wouldn't do something that might threaten the Lord Captain's life? Once we light a bit of fire under them, who knows, perhaps someone will confess. So, sod off, traitor spawn, or I'll put a baton through your skull for attacking an enforcer. I couldn't care less about your rank."
